attributes.action: Get GPs back to seeing people
attributes.background: Get the doctors in general practice to start face to face consultations instead of phone calls

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. GPs are able to accept in-person appointments, but it's a decision for each practice who should be seen.

The NHS has written to GPs to make sure they are communicating this to patients. You can read a news story about this here:

https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/health-54138915
